### Introduction

In this exercise, we will get some experience working with a variety of different algorithms used for ENMs/SDMs.

**Overview of algorithms**

- Presence-absence
  - GLM
- Presence-only
  - `maxnet`([R package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/maxnet/maxnet.pdf))
- Hybrid
  - `embarcadero` ([R package](https://github.com/cjcarlson/embarcadero); [publication](https://besjournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/2041-210X.13389))
- Joint SDMs
    - `hSDM` ([R package](https://ecology.ghislainv.fr/hSDM/))
    - `HMSC` ([Homepage](https://www2.helsinki.fi/en/researchgroups/statistical-ecology/hmsc), [publication](https://besjournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/2041-210X.13345), [Github](https://github.com/hmsc-r/HMSC))
